---
title: "ECDF and QQ Plot"
format: html
editor: source
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
v<-trees$Volume
q<-ecdf(v)
predicted<-pnorm(v,mean=mean(v),sd=sd(v))
observed<-q(v)
ggplot()+geom_point(aes(x=predicted,y=observed),alpha=.5)+xlim(0,1)+ylim(0,1)+ggtitle("QQ Plot of Volumes of Trees")
```
